License

The geographr package as a whole is distributed under the MIT license.

The geographr package Contains OS data © Crown copyright and database right
2021. It also includes other open source data components. The following is a
list of these components and their licenses (full copies of the license
agreements used by these components are included below):

- The Office for National Statistics (ONS), https://www.ons.gov.uk/, OGLv3.0
- NHS Digital, https://digital.nhs.uk/, OGLv3.0
- The Open Geography portal from the Office for National Statistics (ONS),
  https://geoportal.statistics.gov.uk/, OGLv3.0
- SpatialData.gov.scot (Copyright Scottish Government, contains Ordnance Survey data © Crown copyright and database right 2021), https://spatialdata.gov.scot/, OGLv3.0,
- Public Health Scotland, https://www.opendata.nhs.scot/, OGLv3.0,
- Open Data NI, https://www.opendatani.gov.uk/, OGLv3.0
